components.description:
A profile of an open hand pushing or positioned with the palm toward the right. 

May be used to show a hand pushing something away or to represent rejection of something in general. May also be used with with ü´∑ Leftwards Pushing Hand to show hands high fiving or holding, pressing, or squishing something.
components.title: Rightwards Pushing Hand

title: Rightwards Pushing Hand

version.description:
Unicode 15.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 13, 2022. 20 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 31 new emojis (including sequences) listed under Emoji 15.0.

 

  • üìù Unicode 15.0 details on Unicode.org
